meanings.definition: Not faded or dimmed in color or brightness.
meanings.sent1: The unfaded flowers in the garden looked vibrant and colorful.
meanings.sent2: The painting's unfaded hues stood out among the rest.
meanings.sent3: She proudly displayed her unfaded artwork, untouched by time.
meanings.sent4: His unfaded memories of childhood brought a smile to his face.
meanings.sent5: The unfaded rainbow in the sky was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: Not diminished or lessened in intensity or quality.
meanings.sent1: The unfaded enthusiasm of the children was contagious.
meanings.sent2: Her unfaded determination to succeed never wavered.
meanings.sent3: The unfaded energy of the puppy kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: His unfaded love for music was evident in every note he played.
meanings.sent5: The unfaded joy in her eyes lit up the room.
